query:
-- Criar 3 agendamentos para Miguel
INSERT INTO appointments (patientId, therapistUserId, therapyType, startTime, endTime, status, createdAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com'),
  'psicologia',
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) + INTERVAL 9 HOUR,
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) + INTERVAL 10 HOUR,
  'scheduled',
  NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com'),
  'fonoaudiologia',
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) + INTERVAL 10 HOUR,
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) + INTERVAL 11 HOUR,
  'scheduled',
  NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com'),
  'terapia_ocupacional',
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR,
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) + INTERVAL 15 HOUR,
  'scheduled',
  NOW();

SELECT 'Dados criados!' as status;
